page.title: 18Religion in NW Derby
page.content: In our area there are only Christian Churches. 11 are Church of England, 3 Roman Catholic, 5 Methodist and 1 church each for Baptist, Christian Scientist, United Reform, Elim, Congregational and Church of the Latter Day Saints. {All Saints}became{Derby Cathedral}in 1927. The oldest part is the Mediaeval tower. Inside it is light and colour- ful with features such as Robert Bakewell's Iron Gates and Bess of Hardwick's tomb.{St. Mary's Roman {Catholic Church}has a large tower like the Cathedral. They are close together and are easy to see from a long distance.{St. Werburgh's Church}is where Dr. Samuel Johnson was married. {St. Alkmund's Church}is very modern with a fibre glass spire which was lifted on by helicopter.
